definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: So an ABR by definition is a member of two or more areas.
sentences.chinese: 區域邊界路由器是兩個或者多個區域的成員。

sentences.english: The router's role is then to move traffic between the VLANs.
sentences.chinese: 這時，路由器的作用就是在VLAN之間傳遞流量。

sentences.english: Conception client software resides "on" the router, and a camera.
sentences.chinese: 動態域名客戶端軟件駐留在一個路由器，攝像頭。

sentences.english: Networks using wormhole routing techniques are particularly vulnerable to deadlock.
sentences.chinese: 採用蟲孔路由技術，網絡中容易發生死鎖。

sentences.english: We have a Cisco E300 router as well.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個路由器，以及思科的e300。

sentences.english: Behind this interface, requests are routed to the existing systems.
sentences.chinese: 在這個接口中，請求將被路由到現有系統。

sentences.english: How to display all the BGP in the database route?
sentences.chinese: 如何顯示在數據庫中的所有BGP路由？

sentences.english: However, only the wrong routing alarm was included on the short-list.
sentences.chinese: 然而，只有錯誤的路由警報是列入名單。

sentences.english: The connection could not be disconnected because it was created by the multi-protocol router.
sentences.chinese: 通訊不能被斷開，因爲該通訊被多協議路由器完成。

sentences.english: Study of the difference between three-ply switches and routers.
sentences.chinese: 研究三層交換機與路由器之間的區別。

sentences.english: The metric is a value that measures the desirability of a route.
sentences.chinese: 權值是量測一個路由的可取性的值。

sentences.english: Even a system administrator can have tasks routed to him or her.
sentences.chinese: 系統管理員甚至也可能收到路由給他的任務。

sentences.english: Controlling routing at the physical network layer embeds policy into topology.
sentences.chinese: 在物理網絡層控制路由需要將策略嵌入到拓撲中。

sentences.english: Press to get to the router prompt.
sentences.chinese: 按下回車鍵進入路由器提示符狀態。

sentences.english: Some defined set of criteria determines where a router sends the message.
sentences.chinese: 某些既定的標準決定路由器將把信息發送到哪裏。

sentences.english: Then we will goto the core working principle of OLSR.
sentences.chinese: 隨後深入剖析OLSR路由協議核心工作原理。

definition: along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
